meanings.definition: In a manner resembling a monopod
meanings.sent1: She hopped monopodially across the room.
meanings.sent2: The robot moved monopodially, balancing on a single wheel.
meanings.sent3: The clown danced monopodially, pretending to have only one leg.
meanings.sent4: The tree swayed monopodially in the strong wind.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast performed monopodially on the balance beam.
